name: test_e2e_with_logs[673_CRLF_SESSION_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CRLF_SESSION_001` |
| **Name** | Session Fixation via JSESSIONID CRLF |
| **Category** | CRLF |
| **Subcategory** | session_fixation |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `\r\nSet-Cookie:JSESSIONID=attacker_session`
- **Encoded**: `%0d%0aSet-Cookie%3AJSESSIONID%3Dattacker_session`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~4000ms
- **Timestamp**: 14:18:21.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

|------|-------|

| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX CRLF] CRLF Injection attempt detected test_id=CRLF_SESSION_001-1772115501512-0qpwj pattern_id=CRLF_SESSION_001 uri=/?q=%0d%0aSet-Cookie%3AJSESSIONID%3Dattacker_session client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence
